website_summaries.verdict: A compact, 18-inch white dishwasher with a stainless steel interior and wheels for portability.
pros: The clean design of this dishwasher allows it to fit with any decor
It features 6 wash programs, a faucet adapter that fits standard-sized aerator openings for both male and female connections, and it has a depth of 49 inches when the door is fully open
cons: There are some problems with the durability of the wheels, which can be an issue if you need to frequently move the unit about

website_summaries.verdict: A portable model that offers a combination of some nice features and some quality and performance concerns.
pros: Has 6 wash cycles, time delay, and a dry cycle
Slim build works in tight spaces
Can fit up to 8 place settings
cons: Tends to leave detergent residue on dishes
A few reports of leaks and broken wheels

customer_reviews.title: A great find!
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected. I sell appliances for a living, but where I work does not offer a compact unit like this. It is very quiet, cleans well, and is very easy to use. It is as good as the full size dishwashers I sell every day.
customer_reviews.author: John Campbell

customer_reviews.title: WORKA GREAT FOR MY STUDIO APARTMENT
customer_reviews.text: At first I had a hard time opening the door. Pulling on the handle will not open it. I learned that you have to tug on it from the sides because it has a tight seal. I purchased this for my studio apartment and so far it works great. The cycle is about 2 hours long on normal but it’s very quiet with a light humming sound. My dishes are nice and clean. This was my first use. I’ll update if anything goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Only had this a few days but it's awesome. Definitely worth every penny, will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: good not great.
customer_reviews.text: It's good not great. It doesn't have a heating element and that's not made clear anywhere. I did find that info by googling the product and looking at other sites for description. You have to use your hot water (that's fine.) The listed wash times are inaccurate, it takes about 2 hours for the all in one load. For all I know this is as good as it gets for these things though, and I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: emily k.

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: I am renting a unit that does not have a dishwasher. This dishwasher is better than nothing, but it isn’t great either. It seems to wash well but not drying; I usually set my dishes on a drying rack to air dry after. It’s a bit expensive considering the size/quality of washing. However, I’ve never bought a dishwasher before, so my opinion may not be as valuable as others. One big pro was the packaging; the delivery person threw it around but no damage to the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning wise this is a mediocre dishwasher. It does ...
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning wise this is a mediocre dishwasher. It does not wash the soap away very well and I usually give it another rinse at the end of each cycle. I guess that for it's price it is reasonable. Unfortunately, after only six month of use, the water pump stopped working and water wasn't being drained from the dishwasher. So, it seems it's' not very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this little dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love this dishwasher! It's very quiet, it does a great job, and it's just so nice to not have constant dishes either in the sink or on the drainboard. Perfect for a small kitchen, providing you have space to stow it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than a regular dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: The unit does the job and cleans well. The only issue is that is is smaller than a regular dishwasher. The placement of bowls, plates, cups etc. are confusing and I had to keep referring to the book so I could fill it. But as I said it does the job. It does not dry the dishes, I guess that's why it's an energy saver. You have to open the door a crack when it's finished and wait a few hours before you can empty. Most dishes are dry by then. If you forget to open when the unit is complete they dishes are wet and you have to hand dry everything and I mean everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Farley

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine. But the rack rusts.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this SPT 18" portable dishwasher a year and half ago and I'm still loving it! It works great and stays clean. Does a great job though don't think it fits as many dishes as it says it does. I have soft wood fir floors in the kitchen and the casters never cause a scratch or dent of any kind. Great dishwasher but the prongs on the bottom rack and have rusted and most have broken off. Manufacturer's advice was to buy a new rack :(
customer_reviews.author: Suza

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have three young children, and like to host people from our neighborhood and church for meals as often as we can. We also rent an apartment that has no dishwasher currently, and we finally got frustrated with how much time it was taking us to do the dishes and bought this dishwasher. I wish I'd done this a year ago! It's a huge time saver for us. It was packed safely for shipping, incredibly easy to hook up, cleans the dishes well, and is pretty quiet. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The silverware basket is terribly flimsy as is the whole inside
customer_reviews.text: So far it's a cheap piece of junk! Attempted to roll to sink, & one of front casters broke off. Don't know if it was broken before or just happened. Finally got it to stay on so that I could wash dishes. The silverware basket is terribly flimsy as is the whole inside. I'm waiting to see how the dishes come out. Also, there is a small dent at the bottom of door. I expected more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Wehmeyer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this little dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little dishwasher! We didn't have one for many years and there is not a place to build one into our little kitchen. This unit is just the right size and easily does a day's worth of dishes for 3 people, not including pots and pans. I still hand wash those. My husband is immune-compromised and it's nice to be able to know the dishes are sterilized. Since it's a portable, I do make sure all residue and crumbs are off the dishes, so I'm really using it for the sanitation purpose, which it does very well :)
customer_reviews.author: luna3

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you read the bad reviews. The hoses on mine are already leaking after 45 days and they will not take it back
customer_reviews.author: tina shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: The run times do seem pretty long, and the time displayed is definitely not ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for about six months. The run times do seem pretty long, and the time displayed is definitely not accurate. We've learned to just use the Speed setting as we rinse our dishes first anyway. Overall, I am happy to have it.
customer_reviews.author: bookgrl

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Box came damaged. There was dirt in the packaging and I think it has a defective pump as it was quiet and onnthe 3rd use it has gotten really noisy. Super disappointed with this product. Just getting more noisy and not even sure how to replace it or get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty darn well.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My only complaint is that there seems to be a residue left some of the time. It is very quiet so you can run it any time. Wish it rolled a bit easier but I am knit picking here. I am a household of one so it is the perfect size but not for a family. Easy to load and unload. Instructions very clear. Overall I am very pleased and after washing dishes by hand for the past 4 years I am thrilled. I hate doing dishes and this makes it a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered pretty beat up - the box was wet and there was dirt in the packaging- but the washer was fine. I really like this machine. It’s small and works well. My favorite feature are the retractable hoses and cords. The adapter for the faucet works well and fit perfectly. I got a countertop dishwasher before this and it was terrible. Not only was it much bulkier than I expected but it also leaked out the bottom. The cord and hoses had no where to go and the adapter did not fit with my standard sink. For how heavy and difficult the countertop dishwasher was, the roll-away dishwasher is worth the space it takes up.
customer_reviews.author: annaislyne

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This compact dishwasher gives you great value for your buck!! Lots of room for a small dishwasher! Easy to use & push! You MUST understand it DOESN’T have a drying cycle but if you use hot water the dishes DO air dry quickly! It’s very quiet and has a bunch of removable pieces to give you more space for irregular size dishes! It cleans very well! BUT keep in mind it has different wash cycles and on a normal wash it takes 1 hour & 55 minutes to finish a complete wash!
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with a small dishwasher. It cleans the dishes pretty well. But there is really no room for more than one pot or pan. It says the top rack is adjustable, but I don't see any instructions on how to and the hose fitting at the back of the rack has to fit into the back wall. Never completely dries and you cannot repeat just the dry cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W.

customer_reviews.title: ... a year now and so far I am very pleased! It works well
customer_reviews.text: I've had this portable dishwasher for a year now and so far I am very pleased! It works well. Multiple settings. I fill the detergent dispenser only about half way and it cleans a full load. You don't have a dryer built in but I find if you crack the door after the clean cycle is complete and set the silverware tray on top, it air dries just fine. Happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great for the outdoor kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great so far, only been using it a few weeks so... But, on the normal setting it takes 2hrs and it gets the dishes clean. It would be nice if it would dry the dishes, but not a big deal to me. I use it in my out door kitchen, and it is great! After dinner just load it up and run it when I go to the house for the night. Now in the summer time I rarely run the dishwasher in the house LOL. Definately a good purchase for the outdoor kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best decision to buy it
customer_reviews.text: It is as good as regular dishwasher. It washes dishes nicely. We changed the kitchen faucet so that we can fix the dishwasher adapter. Drainage is right into the sink. The only thing it doesn’t do is drying. But if you leave it open for an hour, dishes will dry on it’s own. It has reduced alot of work in terms of daily chores. It is a big investment but a wise decision
customer_reviews.author: Blogger

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this I haven’t had to do dishes since they only thing I can say is that YOU MUST USE POWERED SOAP, I didn’t know any better and tried liquid and it leaked everywhere I also tried liquid soap on the old one I bought and actually sent it back cause I thought it was broke, turns out it was just me using liquid soap instead of powered so I messed up make sure to use powered soap
customer_reviews.author: Cody Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: So much better than hand washing...
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Just ran my third load. Today I timed how long it took me to set up...28 seconds. I have a long narrow kitchen and it sits at the end of the counter on one side. It's the same height as my counter so it actually gives me more counter space. I wheel the washer out of its spot and over to the sink. Pull the hose out of the back housing and it pops on to the nozzle (comes with adapter that makes it work on any faucet). Plug in, turn the water on, you're ready to go. Dishes come out perfectly clean. My kitchen stays so much cleaner now. Love it! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: When they deliver the product they don’t let you know its there and you need help moving it inside the house.
customer_reviews.text: It leaks around the hookup no matter what I do and it doesn’t beep at the end as it s suppose to. It does wash the dishes well but it leaves residue in the skillet and pans and it doesn’t dry the dishes like I thought it did but upon calling the co. I was told no it doesn’t have a dryer and most dishwashers don,t because that cycle costs a lot more!
customer_reviews.author: patricia wright

customer_reviews.title: Everything it should be
customer_reviews.text: If you need a good dishwasher but don't have much room. This may be for you. We move it over carpet so it's an effort but I'm 60 and not in good shape. We (2) use it once a day and rarely have leftover dishes if we keep it up. It cleans beautifully, doesn't leak. It hooks up easily. Not like my mom's from the 60s. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: imzadi

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Ran it twice so far and dishes came out spotless. So nice not to have to bend over the sink and wash dishes anymore. Mine was delivered and the inside was also wet, must test run them and not bother drying before boxing them up. Update: seems the light under the Jet dry is low light, does not work. I emailed customer service about it, just asking what the light is for, out of curiosity, but they never replied back. Still a great dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: I liked being able to have a dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I liked being able to have a dishwasher, but then it broke. I called the company and they told me it was probably the inexpensive motherboard. I bought a new one and put it in. It still didn't work. Now I have discovered that no one knows how to repair these. My only choice is to bring it back to the manufacturing plant, which is very impractical for me. Next time I buy a major appliance, I am going to check to see if I can get it repaired locally
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got my dishwasher today and I love it! It quietly swishes washing all my dishes as I type this. The hose connector fits male or female faucets so I just screwed it on and viola! Water for the dishwasher. It came box inside of box so there were no dents or scratches. The wheels on the bottom make it a breeze to move around. Get one, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is the best dishwasher ever. In cabinet or out.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this dishwasher for a few weeks or more. WOW. I am telling you this is by far the best dishwasher that I have ever had. It cleans amazingly. We use the "speedy" setting and it's still amazing. Love it. Wish I could be a salesman for them because its worth 3 x the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mtnsport

customer_reviews.title: Just dont buy from stores123
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Quiet for what it is. The size measures as described and fits well in tight spaces. The extra counter space helps out alot. It comes with everything you need, so no need to buy the sink adaptor. My only complaint lies with the seller "Stores123", they have crappy customer service and their policies differ from amazon. Be careful buying anything from stores123 as they are a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: but nothing major and easy to mop up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit after reading the reviews. They are accurate. We are enjoying our new machine. It does leave a few drips on the floor after running, but nothing major and easy to mop up.
customer_reviews.author: Kittie Lashua

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by Size
customer_reviews.text: This is a small dishwasher. I was disappointed by its size. Also it has no drying feature so you have to air dry dishes which is hassle. I wouldn't recommend this unless your single and dont have many dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyennejochec

customer_reviews.title: Portable Dishwasher A+++++!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best portable dishwasher! I have done my research and watched the videos and this is the best portable dishwasher! Very highly rated on consumer reviews! Easy to use and quiet! Takes about the same time as a built in dishwasher. Cleans dishes great! I would recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I love this dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I love this dishwasher. I live in a 100 year old house (so no dishwasher). This portable dishwasher works great and is easy to store in my pantry. I have learned that certain dishwasher soaps work better than others! I am currently using the Cascade pods and they are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m not very satisfied with this the wheels keep falling off it leaves the dishes soaking wet and I regret buying it
customer_reviews.author: John tuetken

customer_reviews.title: Leaves Smudges
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it washes our dishes decently. However, it consistently leaves smudges, and some types of food are not easily cleaned by this washing machine. We'll find food gunk on our pots and pans, along with wet patches of food still clinging to our plates. As a disclaimer, we follow the washing machine's guide on how to orient our dishware to a T.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Practical maid for me.
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed. This machine cleans better than my old big brand dishwasher. The one ability I miss is being able to fit a 20" frying pan & the cookie sheet in it. Long utensils must go on the top. It makes kitchen job easier.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene G

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher is very good at cleaning dishes thoroughly and is easy to hook up/put away. We have very limited space in our kitchen, and this fits well. My one complaint is that the timer for how long a load of dishes will take is wildly inaccurate. It takes at least an hour longer than the timer indicates it will. Now that we are aware of this, it's not a huge deal, but the first few times we ran it we thought it was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: damage but work amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I got it arrived my home with some damaged, but when i use it, it never failed me, I dont have to wash the dishes twice. i dont even rinse the dishes, it doing very good job, very surprise for that size machine, does very good job like full size dish washer does.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Has an expanding top rack!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth buying! Had dishes that were extremely dirty after a week of not being able to do them. (I work long hours). It cleaned them no issue and it's easier to put together then a lot of them out there! It doesn't have a dry cycle but if you open the door slightly it will air dry them or take a clean towel to dry them. Don't waste your money on one that has a heating cycle! This is the best I have seen!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Austin

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Works well
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Works well.. With the wheels its too tall to fit into the space I have but I can work around that. Holds a good amount of dishes. For 2 people I only need to use it every 2 or 3 days. Update nearly a year of use and still does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: laurie boyles

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, size and power just right!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this dishwasher but it has proved to be a powerhouse so far. For a family of three the size is perfect, not too small as was my biggest concern. I run it once a day and save an hour of my time as well as water. Also I recommend using jet for dry dishes because without you will be waiting hours after the cycle ends for things to dry before putting them away. The only thing I can complain about is the delivery but that falls on UPS, who dropped it off on the middle of my driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Works just like a high-end regular dishwasher, expect that it is (obviously) smaller, not totally quite (but it's really not load at all), and it can take 2h, depending on the program. But, all the toughest grease is gone! And, I got $50 rebate from my energy supplier for the energy star rating.
customer_reviews.author: matthewilfoe

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher, works strong
customer_reviews.text: Nice dishwashe and fitted perfect under the cabinet area I needed. Thought it be more, space inside but that's my more then the dishwasher since it's described the size. U would be happy w this.
customer_reviews.author: Deloris

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feeling
customer_reviews.text: Works great smaller then I thought. Also the paint in the back on the top is pealing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my life easier
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Had no problems getting it set up or learning how to use it. Does a fantastic job cleaning the dishes with a rinse off before there put in there. The regular cycle is 1:56 with about a half hour of “drying” at the end. Then I open the door let the air dry and put away when ready. So thankful for this! Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: kevin doshna

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. This was worth every penny. I do get annoyed hooking it up and trying to remember to turn off the water, but this thing is a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Brussel

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: The Wife loves it. So the house is happy. Did have to replace the Kohler Faucet with a Delta to get it to work. Then to adapt the spigot outlet since the quick connect adapter was incorrect for the Delta
customer_reviews.author: P. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: To rinse your dishes enough so you don’t have to clean the filter too often.
customer_reviews.text: We love this dishwasher! I was worried it wouldn’t fit between the counter and the shelving for when we don’t need it in the kitchen but it’s just the right size! I love that on the bottom shelf the wiring can be put down for larger items!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Schenkelberg

customer_reviews.title: It is not a super powerful dishwasher that will cut all the crusted on ...
customer_reviews.text: Dishwasher works well. It is not a super powerful dishwasher that will cut all the crusted on food off, but it does a good enough job. Effective and efficient and easily moved around to where you need to store it.
customer_reviews.author: John Wagner

customer_reviews.title: This little dishwasher is amazing! The set up was super easy and so ...
customer_reviews.text: This little dishwasher is amazing! The set up was super easy and so was unpacking it. I am petite female and was able to handle everything easily. It washes dishes really well and the energy savings for the year are a bonus. If you’re thinking about getting this JUST DO IT. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Thi Phomprida

customer_reviews.title: All that the ad claims it to be!
customer_reviews.text: I had no counter space to add a dishwasher to, which is why I purchased a portable dishwasher. This product is great. Easy to wheel up to sink, runs about 2 hours, unload and tuck into the corner of the room. It’s sturdy, efficient, quiet, and conserves so much water and time. I knew it wasn’t full size, it is about half the size of your normal dishwasher. It’s great for the three of us. Would be difficult with a larger family.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousMom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Quit working in less than 6 months. The cost to ship back for repairs, and return shipping would be the same as buying a new one. It is a nice size, fit perfect for my small galley kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This machine works wonders!!! I've had it for a few weeks now and I'm so relieved we finally have a portable dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Shirley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have waited a month to write this review because I wanted to give this portable dishwasher an honest try. I LOVE IT!!!!!!! It is small enough to stash by the back door, easy enough to wheel around. It washes great. It does not dry, but it never stated that it would. I would definitely recommend this to anyone in need of a small dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: patty H

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Much better than our old one
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, fantastic! Wasn't sure what to expect when our old dishwasher bit the dust. This one is not too large and does a great job. No complaints here! It is much better then the one it replaces...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop pre-washing.
customer_reviews.text: OMFG! Just buy this machine, I’m currently relaxing whilst the dishwasher cleans the dishes it’s 5x more water efficient than I can do by hand. Down side it sometimes doesn’t wash off all the detergent but a touch of the button solves that. It’s super quiet like 55-60 dB. It cleans dried on egg or cheese from yesterday this machine is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher fits our space and needs perfectly. As soon as the cycle is complete, we remove the dishes and place in drainer rack where they quickly dry. We've had it about 1 month, normally use it daily. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AReader

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: The width of this model is six inches smaller than normal units which leaves more room in the kitchen and it is quiet compared to our older Maytag. The amount of dishwasher detergent to use is rather vague so we just fill up both parts and everything works out just great. This a great well made unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Great dishwasher. Especially since it's just my husband and I in the household now. Perfect for just us 2.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea and Brian Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Do it! It will save you a ton of time.
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher works great! We've had it for a year. Only advice is that the filter down below the drain should be cleaned every time if in order to ensure clean dishes every time. We have a tiny kitchen and this acts as an island, so we have more work space.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well
customer_reviews.text: Works great get the hose adapter for a few bucks do yourll be ready to use it rightvaway
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: such as putting better wheels on it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this dishwasher almost a year!. Still going strong, Have made no adjustments to it.. such as putting better wheels on it.. etc etc..
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Moves easily even when loaded. Cleans dishes great. Very pleased with this dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Nanajan

customer_reviews.title: Great find! Affordable! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my dishwasher so far, works just as good as a full sized one. I really like how easy it was to set up initially and how simple it is to install for each use. It has been a life saver having it. I would recommend it to anyone who has a small kitchen. And it was affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love this dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Love this dishwasher. The first one had to be replaced, because I received it damaged. Amazon had no issues replacing it. This dishwasher saves me so much time and effort hand washing.
customer_reviews.author: DO74

customer_reviews.title: I live in a home with no counter space!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use! Cleans pots and dishes like you can never do in a sink. I don’t leave dishes in the sink anymore . Outer case came dented but I can live with that
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I wish it was bigger but it is way better than washing dishes by hand.
customer_reviews.author: The one true reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this dishwasher for a couple of years and it is still running great. Perfect size for my needs and very easy to hookup, disconnect and put away. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Barfield

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Love that we have a dish washer now. This model does require a bit of prewashing really dirty dishes but its better than no dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Chris.R

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Pasta, peanut butter and dried eggs disappear in this thing never to be seen again. I cannot hear this beyond the kitchen except for a couple minutes between wash and rinse when it does the filter back flush, and when it beeps at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Krattiger

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only issue I have... Its hard to put the water lines and power cord back into the washer for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this dishwasher has been a positive experience. The item came packaged very nicely, arrived quickly and was simple to set up. Within 5 minutes of delivery I had a functioning dishwasher. So far it has performed perfectly. Runs quiet and dishes come out sparkling clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sean W.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased in June, died in November
customer_reviews.text: Somehow it thinks there is no water coming in but it is full of water (E1).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad we bought this!! It works great! I did a ton of research before I ordered it and I'm so glad I did because this is the best purchase I have made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: New mom

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as a full size dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little machine. Built well...nothing cheap about the materials used I’m the kind of guy who does not wash his plates before loading them into the dishwasher and they come out super clean Thumbs up on this little work horse
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: would highly recommend to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this dishwasher since September 2017 and it’s been so great! No issues whatsoever! Works best with rinse aid. We have a family of 4 and it’s been a life saver!! Would Recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: LemonKiwi

customer_reviews.title: Dead after a year
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a year. $475 flushed down the drain. Absolute waste of money. Am beyond angry.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Lara

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our house, acts as a nice mini island too for canning runs.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Lynn Stafford

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite appliance purchases ever. We've had it for a couple months and I am very pleased. Works better than some regular dishwashers I've used. And its small enough to fit perfectly into an apartment-sized kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Marwan

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing about this product that concerns me.  It is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something small due to space in my home. This fit perfectly but was still big enough to hold quite a few dishes. Washes cups, dishes pots, pans-everything. And always comes out clean and streak free.
customer_reviews.author: deborah carter

customer_reviews.title: Small, yet effective
customer_reviews.text: Small but extemely useful, great for small kitchens and tight spaces as it is extremely mobile
customer_reviews.author: Katherina

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Holds more dishes than expected. Works great, very quiet. You can pay more for a portable dishwasher and get less. This one is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. James

customer_reviews.title: Mind Boggling
customer_reviews.text: So far this dishwasher is working great (knock wood) Cleans great and very quite. But after I removed the box and packaging (that was in great shape) I removed the plastic bag from the dishwasher and the inside of it was wet. The outside one the dishwasher was wet with a gritty substance on it. I opened the door to the dishwasher and the inside was wet also along with a small dent on the inside of the door. I'm baffled how this could have happened because packaging was dry and perfect. But the darn thing works, for now anyways
customer_reviews.author: jody c.

customer_reviews.title: The dishwasher is great, but delivery was a problem
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher is great, but delivery was a problem. It was left on our porch even though we were home, and we had to carry it up three flights of stairs. This thing weights 150 pounds and is not carry-friendly, so this was no small feat.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gruessner

customer_reviews.title: Love this dishwasher made my life easier it can pack ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this dishwasher made my life easier it can pack a lot of dishes really for being a 18 inches wide gets dishes clean easy to use and hook up
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Blue

customer_reviews.title: It is smaller than the average size, but perfect for my little kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I did not like, was that I had to go to Home Depot and buy the correct hook up for my faucet. But once I had that, it works like a charm, and is so quiet, I sometimes forget it's running!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn S. Kearns

customer_reviews.title: This washer works nicely and is amazingly quiet
customer_reviews.text: oh my dishes are soooo clean. This washer works nicely and is amazingly quiet. The only real draw back is you need to truly have a place to put it or it is in the way and you need to remember that , although most dishwashers take 2 hours, this machine ties up your kitchen water faucet for 2 hours. Still and all, I am glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: auntie j

customer_reviews.title: Small but mightier
customer_reviews.text: I love this small portable dishwasher. I do not have a lot of room and this works perfectly in my kitchen. Able to handle even larger pots or pans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Brier

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love this dishwasher! Cleans perfectly, and easy to use. I had to replace my faucet to hook it up, but it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan J Roach

customer_reviews.title: ... future son in law and my daughter and they love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my future son in law and my daughter and they love it
customer_reviews.author: doris gyorody

customer_reviews.title: Great Dishwasher! I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great Dishwasher! I love it! Works amazing!! It gets all my dishes sparkling clean. Even the dried on food! A bit compact but i can actually fit a lot in it. So glad I bought this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: We are pleased with this dishwasher. (It certainly beats spending hours washing by hand). Once you know how to use it, it is very easy. It does a good job of cleaning and I love that it can easily be rolled around.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Get this!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want to do the plumbing this is the greatest invention of all time. No more dishes! It's fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Benway

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 2 person household
customer_reviews.text: Great for a 2 person household. It is small but holds a couple days worth of dishes. And its quiet.
customer_reviews.author: T. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the good reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition and working well almost 3 months later. Be prepared to dispose of a lot of boxing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get one for your mom and them, and tell her I said hello
customer_reviews.text: My mother loves it for its convenience and easy, fun use. I love it because it means she usually does her dishes. Win. Win.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher was everything that was described. We love the size, easy mobility, and easy to operate. Would definitely recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: baby

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Works great and fits perfectly in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: TheReader

product_meta.title: SPT SD-9241W: Energy Star 18" Portable Dishwasher - White
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Spacious cavity loads up to eight standard place settings. Features easy controls, durable stainless steel interior and water temperature up to 154°F. Quick connect to any kitchen faucet eliminates the need for direct plumbing or permanent installation. Features and Functions: Time Delay Feature: allows you to program operation at a later start time (1-24 hours); Error Alarm: displays fault codes; Rinse Aid Warning Indicator: refill reminder on rinse aid; Stainless Steel Interior; 6 Wash Programs: All-in-1, Heavy, Normal, Light , Rinse and Speed; Adjustable upper rack to accommodate larger plates/pots; Faucet adapter included for quick and simple connection; Automatic detergent and rinse agent dispenser; Up to 8 standard place settings; Energy Star; Input voltage: 120V / 60Hz; Energy consumption: 295kwh/yr.; Water consumption (normal cycle): 3.65 gallons; Power consumption: 110W; Noise level (normal): 55dB; Drain tube length: 3 ft. "Spacious cavity loads up to eight standard place settings. Features easy controls, durable stainless steel interior and water temperature up to 154°F. Quick connect to any kitchen faucet eliminates the need for direct plumbing or permanent installation. Features and Functions: Time Delay Feature: allows you to program operation at a later start time (1-24 hours); Error Alarm: displays fault codes; Rinse Aid Warning Indicator: refill reminder on rinse aid; Stainless Steel Interior; 6 Wash Programs: All-in-1, Heavy, Normal, Light , Rinse and Speed; Adjustable upper rack to accommodate larger plates/pots; Faucet adapter included for quick and simple connection; Automatic detergent and rinse agent dispenser; Up to 8 standard place settings;Energy Star; Input voltage: 120V / 60Hz; Energy consumption: 295kwh/yr.; Water consumption (normal cycle): 3.65 gallons; Power consumption: 110W; Noise level (normal): 55dB; Drain tube length: 3 ft. Our faucet adapter fits standard size Aerator openings for both the male and female connections. The sizes: Male 15/16""; Female 55/64"". As long as your faucet has a removable Aerator they should be able to connect the faucet adapter. For a standard faucet head with a side/detached sprayer: While attached to the standard faucet, some detached sprayers will have water start coming out of them due to the line pressure. This is from the design of those faucets to redirect the water pressure from the main faucet head to the side sprayer. If you have a side sprayer, you will most likely need to install a water line that is separated from the sprayer."
feature_bullets: 6 Wash Programs: All-in-1, Heavy, Normal, Light , Rinse and Speed
Automatic detergent and rinse agent dispenser
Adjustable upper basket to accomodate large pots/plates
